abstract: C.C. Sabathia could pitch for the Yankees in Game 5 on Thursday, but Justin Verlander will not be available for Detroit.
snippet: C.C. Sabathia could pitch for the Yankees in Game 5 on Thursday, but Justin Verlander will not be available for Detroit.
lead_paragraph: If Game 5 of the Yankees-Tigers American League division series is close in the late innings Thursday night, C.C. Sabathia could pitch for the Yankees, Manager Joe Girardi said. But Justin Verlander will not be available for Detroit, according to Manager Jim Leyland.
